runCommand: retryCnt=15; waitTime=30; while true; do sudo mount -t efs -o iam,tls ${efs_fs_id}:/ /mnt/efs/${efs_fs_id} && sudo echo -e "\n${efs_fs_id}:/ /mnt/efs/${efs_fs_id} efs _netdev,noresvport,tls,iam 0 0" >> /etc/fstab  ; if [ $? = 0 ] || [ $retryCnt -lt 1 ]; then echo File system mounted!!; break; fi; echo File system not available, retrying...; ((retryCnt--)); sleep $waitTime; done;
